Package nl.han.ica.yaeger.engine.entities.entity.sprites

Class SpriteEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.han.ica.yaeger.engine.entities.entity.sprites.SpriteEntity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Bounded, Entity, NodeProvider, Removeable, Initializable, ResourceConsumer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    UpdatableSpriteEntity
    public abstract class SpriteEntity
extends java.lang.Object
implements Entity, ResourceConsumer
    A SpriteEntity is a Entity that is represented by an Image.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpriteEntity

        protected SpriteEntity​(java.lang.String resource,
                       Position initialPosition,
                       Size size)
        Instantiate a new SpriteEntity for a given Image.
        Parameters:
        resource - The url of the image file. Relative to the resources folder.
        initialPosition - the initial Position of this Entity
        size - The bounding box of this SpriteEntity.

      • SpriteEntity

        protected SpriteEntity​(java.lang.String resource,
                       Position initialPosition,
                       Size size,
                       int frames)
        Instantiate a new SpriteEntity for a given Image.
        Parameters:
        resource - The url of the image file. Relative to the resources folder.
        initialPosition - the initial Position of this Entity
        size - The bounding box of this SpriteEntity.
        frames - The number of frames this Image contains. By default the first frame is loaded.

      • setCurrentFrameIndex

        public void setCurrentFrameIndex​(int index)
        Set the current frame index of the Sprite image.
        Parameters:
        index - The index that should be shown. The index is zero based and the frame modulo index will be shown.
